name: KS heart Rain
description:
Katawa Shoujo Fangame. Programs used: MaxIDE (BlitzMax) and Pixelator.

Use A and D Keys to move left and right and dodge the hearts! Press Escape key to close the game.

When rin and heart collide the score is shown, and opportunity to restart is given.

Fog around the images is made for easier gameplay. As you play, game becomes harder. My own best score is 99. 

I really hope you will enjoy this game!
